subject: 82 ADDERLEY STR. - Cape Town
body:
82 ADDERLEY STR. - Cape Town.
 
From The Desk of FNB Online Banking,
Banking/Remittance Team.
 
 
Attention:  
Your email message was received.
 As we request early, kindly confirm to us your receiving information details address where your Gold Visa ATM Master Card will be delivered to you.
As regards to your question, your card activation fee of ZAR 6 300 is equivalent to 347, United States Dollar.
And you can call the bellow number if you need more information.
We wait for your urgent reply.
 Sincerely,
Mrs Devirani Naidoo,
Operations Manager.
Phone: 0027 7349 19382.

subject: Re:   82 ADDERLEY STR. - Cape Town
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response. I would like to confirm my receiving details address as requested. My address is .

Regarding the card activation fee, could you please clarify the exact amount in United States Dollars? I want to make sure I have the correct information.

Also, could you provide more details about the Gold Visa ATM Master Card? How does it work and what are its benefits?

Thank you for your assistance. I look forward to your reply.

Best wishes,
Shane
